explanations.machine learning: The paper uses BP neural networks, a type of machine learning algorithm, to predict risks in scientific research project management.
explanations.neural network: The study develops a resource conflict risk management model using Back Propagation (BP) neural networks.
explanations.deep learning: BP neural networks are a foundational component of deep learning, and the paper discusses their application in risk prediction.
explanations.backpropagation: The paper explicitly mentions the use of Back Propagation (BP) neural networks, which rely on the backpropagation algorithm for training.
explanations.BP: The paper uses BP (Back Propagation) neural networks to develop the risk management model.
explanations.hidden layer: The paper mentions the performance of the model remains stable regardless of the number of hidden layer neurons, indicating the use of hidden layers in the neural network.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The paper compares the performance of the BP neural network model with convolutional neural network (CNN) algorithms.
explanations.CNN: The paper compares the performance of the BP neural network model with convolutional neural network (CNN) algorithms.
explanations.dropout regularization: The paper incorporates the Dropout regularization technique to enhance the generalization capacity of the BP neural network.
